scopes.basic: See basic information about this user
scopes.write_post: Create a new post as this user
scopes.follow: Add or remove follows (or mutes) for this user
scopes.public_messages: Send and receive public messages as this user
scopes.messages: Send and receive public and private messages as this user
scopes.update_profile: Update a user's name, images, and other profile information
scopes.files: Manage a user's files. This is not needed for uploading files.
scopes.export: Bulk export all of this user's App.net data. This is intended only for backup services, not day-to-day App.net client use. Users will be shown an extra warning when this scope is requested due to the sensitivity of this data.

endpoints.name: getFollowing
endpoints.description: Retrieve Users a User is following

endpoints.name: getFollowingIds
endpoints.description: Retrieve IDs of Users a User is following

endpoints.name: getFollowerIds
endpoints.description: Retrieve IDs of Users following a User

endpoints.name: getMutedList
endpoints.description: Retrieve muted User IDs for multiple Users

endpoints.name: getBlockedList
endpoints.description: Retrieve blocked User IDs for multiple Users

endpoints.name: getReposters
endpoints.description: Retrieve Users who reposted a Post

endpoints.name: getStars
endpoints.description: Retrieve Users who starred a Post

endpoints.name: getUnreadCount
endpoints.description: Retrieve number of unread PM Channels

endpoints.name: getSubscribers
endpoints.description: Retrieve users subscribed to a Channel

endpoints.name: getSubscriberIds
endpoints.description: Retrieve user ids subscribed to a Channel

endpoints.name: getSubscriberIdList
endpoints.description: Retrieve user ids subscribed to multiple Channels

endpoints.name: getChannel
endpoints.description: Retrieve the Messages in a Channel

endpoints.name: getAll
endpoints.description: Retrieve all Streams for the current Token

endpoints.name: destroyAll
endpoints.description: Delete all Streams for the current Token

endpoints.name: get
endpoints.description: Retrieve Interactions with the current User

endpoints.name: getAuthorizedIds
endpoints.description: Retrieve authorized User IDs for an app

endpoints.name: getAuthorized
endpoints.description: Retrieve authorized User tokens for an app
